name: portfolio-site
description: - using a scroll snap vertical design. restrained use of color since the design is powerful without it. I like a clean palette and the magenta is a bold color. - NOTE: need to add the color to my styles.scss as a variable - accesible, responsive, simple, polished design that is representative of me and my practice - inspired by a physical folder - home, about, tech stack (in about), project, contact sections - branch for each section
